name: Brainstorm Creative Lab
overview:
We are a Lifestyle business which intends to have the largest repository of all content Hip Hop, all young Hip Hop Artists, music & merchandise which is accessible to all Hip Hop fans globally.

We are focused on:

  • Creating a central place for all Hip Hop fans from around the world to be able to: o Buy, download, listen & stream-own hip hop music, tickets or merchandise o Get information socially of just about everything Hip Hop.
  • A central place for all Artists to be able to: o Market themselves, sell their music, sell their merchandise, create their own social following, manage their fan clubs & interact/partner with other artists o Use Artist services to fulfill marketing, organizational and event management tasks.
  • Become the upcoming Artistsâ€™ recording & marketing factory.
  • Own partial the rights of the songs recorded on Contract.
  • Central scouting place for all larger Hip Hop Label companies to get the next generation talent from.
  • Creating a Lifestyle based social platform online where Hip Hop Fans, artists, manufacturers, traders, content writers & publishers can buy and sell physical products, digital products and content.

Specialties Rediscover Hip Hop
